article.title: Status and history for [qud]
article.para: See the Github repository for issues and changes in 2023 and after.

history.history-entry: The language of this translation is in fact “Unified Quichua”, in the old Hispanic orthography. This language does not have an ISO 639-3 code, but is covered by the macrolanguage ISO 639-3 que, BCP 47 qu. Thanks to Philip Jacobs for reporting this error.
stage 4: OHCHR identified as the source, complete XML contributed by Adobe Systems.
